name: bj-orim2
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(wo(w2, w0), wo(w2, w1)))

stmt.origin: mpsyl(wi(w0, w1), wi(wo(w2, w0), wo(w2, w1)), wi(w2, wo(w2, w1)), wi(w0, wo(w2, w1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(wo(w2, w0), wo(w2, w1)))
-| wi(w2, wo(w2, w1))
-| wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, wo(w2, w1)))
-| wi(wi(w2, wo(w2, w1)), wi(wi(w0, wo(w2, w1)), wi(wo(w2, w0), wo(w2, w1))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(wo(w2, w0), wo(w2, w1)))
-| wi(w2, wo(w2, w1))
-| wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, wo(w2, w1)))
-| wi(wi(w2, wo(w2, w1)), wi(wi(w0, wo(w2, w1)), wi(wo(w2, w0), wo(w2, w1))))

|- wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(wo(w2, w0), wo(w2, w1)))
-| wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, wo(w2, w1)))
-| wi(wi(w2, wo(w2, w1)), wi(wi(w0, wo(w2, w1)), wi(wo(w2, w0), wo(w2, w1))))

body.origin:
|- wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, wo(w2, w1)))
-| wi(w1, wo(w2, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(wo(w2, w0), wo(w2, w1)))
-| wi(wi(w2, wo(w2, w1)), wi(wi(w0, wo(w2, w1)), wi(wo(w2, w0), wo(w2, w1))))
-| wi(w1, wo(w2, w1))

|- wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(wo(w2, w0), wo(w2, w1)))
-| wi(wi(w2, wo(w2, w1)), wi(wi(w0, wo(w2, w1)), wi(wo(w2, w0), wo(w2, w1))))

body.origin: |- wi(wi(w2, wo(w2, w1)), wi(wi(w0, wo(w2, w1)), wi(wo(w2, w0), wo(w2, w1))))

cumulated.origin: |- wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(wo(w2, w0), wo(w2, w1)))

comment: Proof of ~ orim2 from the axiomatic definition of disjunction ( ~ olc , ~ orc , ~ jao ) and minimal implicational calculus. (Contributed by BJ, 4-Apr-2021.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
